name: [B]locked and Loaded
description:
Description

A game made for Ludum Dare 38, based on the theme 'A Small World.'

The goal is to defend your world against the incoming block waves. It's an arcade shooter so you'll want to survive as long as you can to get your best high score.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Quit: Escape

Version 1.01 Change log:

- Fixed the missing cursor texture

- Improved performance

- Fixed bug with core scale not resetting

- UI elements should resize with the target resolution (hopefully....)
